channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Could Microsoft buy OpenAI? A new arrangement makes that possible — one day.
item.description: OpenAI’s transition to a profit-driven business model makes it a better candidate for an IPO or an acquisition.

item.title: Consumer sentiment hits four-month low in September as lower- and middle-income Americans worry about jobs
item.description: Consumers were worried about rising risks to business conditions and labor markets, as well as increasing inflation.
